name: Santa's Surprise (Pirate Shell)
description:
'Twas the morning of Christmas Eve. The whole North Pole was preparing for the big night of present delivering and joy giving. Only Santa was nowhere to be seen...

He was out in the forest on a very important mission - to get a present for Mrs. Claus.  She had always wanted a cute little puppy, but there was only one problem - the workshop didn't make any puppies!

So this year Santa ventured deep into the woods to meet with a local sled owner and adopt one of his adorable little huskies. It won't be easy, but it will be worth it to make the one he loves happy.

Nimble Saint Nick

Run, jump and fling yourself across exciting levels as you take control of a surprisingly nimble and positively jolly old man!


Stealthy Santa

Avoid detection as you sneak around, channeling your inner Solid Santa (including alert sound).

Questing Kris Kringle

Solve puzzles and engage in alternative play styles on your quest to surprise Ms. Claus.

Control the Claus
  • Arrows / Analog stick / D-Pad: Movement
  • Up arrow / A button / X button: Jump
  • D key / X button / Square: Attack
  • S key / RT / R2: Fling
  • Down arrow / LT / L2: Crouch
  • R key: Restart level
  • Z key: Adjust resolution
  • Alt + Enter: Full screen
  • Escape key: Quit
Credits & Acknowledgements
